Exide Industries Ltd. announced the appointment of Mr. Manoj Kumar Agarwal as Director – Finance & CFO, effective May 1, 2025.

This appointment was made public on Exide's official website.

The Indian stock market, including NSE and BSE, was closed on May 1, 2025, for Maharashtra Day.

Therefore, there were no trading activities for EXIDEIND stock on this day.

Exide Industries announced its Q4 FY25 results, reporting an 11% fall in profit to ₹254 Crore on May 1, 2025.

EBITDA for the quarter stood at ₹466.6 crore, a 9.6% decrease compared to the corresponding quarter of the previous year.

Earlier in the year, Exide Industries invested ₹150 Crore into its subsidiary, EESL (Exide Energy Solutions Ltd.), on January 17, 2025.

This investment was intended to support EESL's greenfield manufacturing facility in Bengaluru for the production of advanced battery cells.
